# rdf-normalize

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/rdf-ext/rdf-normalize.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/rdf-ext/rdf-normalize)
[![NPM Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/rdf-normalize.svg?style=flat)](https://npm.im/rdf-normalize)

RDF Dataset Normalization as described in the [spec](https://json-ld.github.io/normalization/spec/) from the Credentials W3C community group. Subtitle is "A Standard RDF Dataset Normalization Algorithm".
